item.title: Top Ten Most Disturbing Facts and Impressions of Sarah Palin
item.description: It's not hard to stir up negative publicity when you advocate gunning down wolves from airplanes and deny the human causes of climate change.
item.dc:creator: AlterNet Staff, AlterNet

item.title: Robert Scheer: The New Face of Terrorism? A Square White Guy
item.description: The deadliest biological assault on the United States may have been perpetrated by a church-going white man, with anthrax from our own weapons labs.
item.dc:creator: Robert Scheer
